review: Liked it so much, this is my second one.  Now we can watch movies, etc on either large screen TV.  The ShowBox.apk with AllCast app is a great combination for viewing movies.  You must have a strong wifi signal, and be willing to wait for some buffering for the show to start.  When it does, you're off and running a lot cheaper than going to the theater.  And the popcorn is a LOT cheater at home also.I ran out of HDMI ports on one of my TV's, so one ChromeCast is working on a splitter.More websites are casting all the time, so the range of content is always expanding.  Even YouTube has full length movies.Highly recommended. Pays for itself in no time.
